IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: THE UNITED WAY OF SOUTHERN CAMERON COUNTY'S MISSION IS TO "IMPROVE LIVES BY MOBILIZING THE CARING POWER OF COMMUNITIES TO ADVANCE THE COMMON GOOD".
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE UNITED WAY OF SOUTHERN CAMERON COUNTY'S MISSION IS TO "IMPROVE LIVES BY MOBILIZING THE CARING POWER OF COMMUNITIES TO ADVANCE THE COMMON GOOD".
IRS990.Desc: EDUCATION: UNITED WAY WORKS TO HELP CHILDREN AND YOUTH ACHIEVE THEIR POTENTIAL THROUGH ENSURING A) CHILDREN ENTER SCHOOL WITH LITERACY, EMOTIONAL AND INTELLECTUAL SKILLS; B) ELEMENTARY STUDENTS ARE ACADEMIC ACHIEVERS IN MATH AND READING; AND C) YOUNG PEOPLE GRADUATE FROM HIGH SCHOOL READY FOR COLLEGE OR WORK. BASED ON TEXAS SCHOOL READINESS SCORES, UNITED WAY IS CLOSING THE GAP FOR CHIDREN ENTERING SCHOOL AND REDUCING THE NUMBER OF CHILDREN REPEATING THE EARLY GRADES. THROUGH STRATEGIC DIALOGUES AND DATA REVIEW UNITED WAY IS GAINING AND UNDERSTANDING WHAT IS NECESSARY FOR YOUTH TO COMPLETE HIGH SCHOOL AND GAIN POST SECONDARY CREDENTIALS THAT LEAD TO GOOD PAYING JOBS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: INCOME: THE UNITED WAY'S INCOME INITIATIVE PRIMARILY FOCUSES ON PROMOTING FINANCIAL STABILITY ALONG WITH FINANCIAL INDEPENDENCE. THE UNITED WAY HEADS AN ANNUAL PROGRAM CALLED THE "VOLUNTEER INCOME TAX ASSISTANCE" (VITA), FOR LOW INCOME FAMILIES IN THE COMMUNITY TO REDUCE THE COST OF INCOME TAX PREPARATION AS WELL AS PROMOTE THE AWARENESS OF TAX CREDITS THESE FAMILIES MAY BE ELIGIBLE FOR.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: HEALTH: THE UNITED WAY WORKS TO IMPROVE THE HEALTH OF THOSE WITHIN THE COMMUNITY BY PROVIDING ACCESSIBILITY TO QUALITY HEALTH CARE, ALONG WITH THE PROMOTION OF PREVENTATIVE MEASURES SUCH AS IMPROVED HEALTH AND FITNESS. THE UNITED WAY PARTNERS WITH VARIOUS COMMUNITY PARTNERS BY PROVIDING GRANT FUNDS AND VOLUNTEER ASSISTANCE.

ProgSrvcAccomActyOtherGrp.Desc: COMMUNITY INVESTMENT: FOR GENERAL COMMUNITY IMPACT/INVESTMENT ACTIVITIES THAT BENEFIT THE COMMUNITY AS A WHOLE.

Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE A, PART II, LINE 10, EXPLANATION OF OTHER INCOME:
Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.ExplanationTxt: SPECIAL EVENTS - 2018 AMOUNT: $ 11,093. 2019 AMOUNT: $ 5,307. 2020 AMOUNT: $ 10,550. 2021 AMOUNT: $ 11,786. 2022 AMOUNT: $ 35,455. OTHER INCOME - 2018 AMOUNT: $ 68,563. 2019 AMOUNT: $ 206,123. 2020 AMOUNT: $ 91,302. 2021 AMOUNT: $ 29,998. 2022 AMOUNT: $ 256,813. IN-KIND REVENUE - 2018 AMOUNT: $ 103,290. 2019 AMOUNT: $ 173,412.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION FOLLOWS FASB ASC TOPIC 740, "INCOME TAXES", AS IT RELATES TO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS. MANAGEMENT HAS REVIEWED ITS CURRENT AND PAST FEDERAL INCOME TAX POSITIONS AND HAS DETERMINED, BASED ON CLEAR AND UNAMBIGUOUS TAX LAW AND REGULATIONS, THAT THE TAX POSITIONS TAKEN ARE CERTAIN AND THERE IS NO LIKELIHOOD A MATERIAL TAX ASSESSMENT WOULD BE MADE IF GOVERNMENT AGENCY EXAMINED TAX RETURNS TO AUDIT. ACCORDINGLY, NO PROVISIONS FOR THE EFFECTS OF UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS HAVE BEEN RECORDED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FUNDED PROGRAMS ARE REQUIRED TO PROVIDE QUARTERLY PROGRAM OUTCOME REPORTS AND FINANCIAL REPORTS FOR THE FUNDS UWSCC GRANTS TO THEM. ADDITIONALLY, UWSCC REVIEWS THE AUDITS AND FORMS 990 FOR FUNDED PROGRAMS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE PRESIDENT AND CEO OF UNITED WAY WILL EMAIL EACH BOARD MEMBER A COPY OF THE FORM 990 FOR REVIEW PRIOR TO FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A QUESTIONNAIRE IS CIRCULATED TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS, OFFICERS, AND EMPLOYEES ANNUALLY TO DETERMINE WHETHER THERE ARE ANY CONFLICTS OF INTEREST.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS REVIEWS THE COMPENSATION OF THE CEO AND COMPARES WITH NATIONAL, STATE AND LOCAL COMPENSATION DATA TO DETERMINE IF THE COMPENSATION IS REASONABLE AND IF ANY CHANGES ARE REQUIRED. THE CEO OF UNITED WAY OF SOUTHERN CAMERON COUNTY REVIEWS AND DETERMINES COMPENSATION FOR ALL OTHER EMPLOYEES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GENERAL INFORMATION IS AVAILABLE ON THE UNITED WAY OF SOUTHERN CAMERON COUNTY'S WEBSITE AND SPECIFIC GOVERNING DOCUMENTS ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
THE PROCESS HAS NOT CHANGED FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.
